column1: taken  by  the  1st  to  6th  Respondents  are  inter  alia  illegal,  ultra  vires  and  unlawful.  The
Petitioner’s alleged main grounds of challenge are;

column2: impugned quit notice ‘P19’ was issued without a proper basis as the land concerned
is private land owned by the Petitioner’s husband
the quit notice does not accurately identify the Land
the quit notice was not duly served on the Petitioner and as such the Petitioner is
summons  in  relations  to  the  ejectment  proceedings  in  the  Magistrate’s  Court  of
Balangoda were not duly served on the Petitioner.
